Title: Death Be Not Proud
Plot: Chelina asks Alan to assist her in Texas because her former client is getting executed but may be innocent of the crime.  An old friend of Denny and Shirley asks them for legal representation when she charged with having sexual encounters for a fee.  Lori files a complaint about Denny with Shirley and Paul and they seriously consider doing something about it; especially when they suspect he performed an unethical act on his recent case.
GuestStars: Shelley Long,  Sterling K. Brown,  Conor O'Farrell,  Liam Craig,  Ken Strunk,  James Dalesandro,  Kat Sawyer-Young,  John Considine,  Donovan Scott,  Traber Burns,  William Murphy
